title: The Fallout of the FTX Collapse
description: As Sam Bankman-Fried's crypto empire crumbles, its customers, and other crypto traders, are paying the price.

title: Big Tech’s Layoffs Will Fuel the Industry's Future
description: Plus: The dotcom recovery, a history-making online purchase, and the highway to climate hell.

title: Despite Big Layoffs, Tech Workers Are Still in Demand
description: Tens of thousands of job cuts have rocked the industry, but unemployment among tech workers remains low—and plenty of companies are desperate for talent.

title: Twitter Is on a Collision Course With Europe
description: Layoffs leave only two people in the company’s Brussels office, just as Europe prepares to enforce sweeping new tech rules.
